name: Turtlezombie Tee - Women
description:
The Tee

The Turtlezombie tee in cotton candy pink - designed and inspired by imagination.

Turtlezombie is 1 of 4 turtles in a very limited-run series of Turtlegang tees as part of the oodotdot project.


The Details

Screen printed.

Hand screened in high quality Plastisol for a print made to last.

Feels good.

Made from 4.5 oz 100% ring spun cotton for a simply comfy shirt.

Cut to fit. Cut to wear. Anywhere.

Form fitting with a tapered body. Go ahead, wear it standalone or as part of your casual weekend outfit.

Tag, you're it.

Green oodotdot satin shirt label stitched at the neck hem.

A men's/unisex cut is also available.

Turtlezombie

Turtlezombie was born this way. He comes from a long line of zombie turtles from somewhere deep in the woods and arrived at the pond one day while looking for junk food.

His favourite snacks are pistachios, seaweed pellets and mint chocolate chip ice cream. Turtlezombie loves to eat and has an appetite for anything yummy.

There’s a misconception by other turtles that he’s the “living dead” and nibbles on brains - he's actually really lively and the only thing pink he eats is cotton candy.

name: Turtleshark Tee - Women
description:
The Tee

The Turtleshark tee in sky's the limit blue - designed and inspired by imagination.

Turtleshark is 1 of 4 turtles in a very limited-run series of Turtlegang tees as part of the oodotdot project.


The Details

Screen printed.

Hand screened in high quality Plastisol for a print made to last.

Feels good.

Made from 4.5 oz 100% ring spun cotton for a simply comfy shirt.

Cut to fit. Cut to wear. Anywhere.

Form fitting with a tapered body. Go ahead, wear it standalone or as part of your casual weekend outfit.

Tag, you're it.

Green oodotdot satin shirt label stitched at the neck hem.

A men's/unisex cut is also available.

Turtleshark

Turtleshark wasn’t born awesome like most turtles - he grew up in the suburbs as Turtlewurtle, the pet of an 8 year old boy. One day at the park, the boy taped a broken arrowhead to Turtlewurtle’s shell to scare the pond turtles.

Sensing an opportunity, Turtlewurtle swam out of the boy’s reach, never again having to live in a suburban fishbowl. The pond turtles accepted him and gave him the name, Turtleshark.

Turtleshark now spends his days racing other turtles and enjoying his awesome new life.

name: Turtleturtle Tee - Women
description:
The Tee

The Turtleturtle tee in granny apple green- designed and inspired by imagination.

Turtleturtle is 1 of 4 turtles in a very limited-run series of Turtlegang tees as part of the oodotdot project.


The Details

Screen printed.

Hand screened in high quality Plastisol for a print made to last.

Feels good.

Made from 4.5 oz 100% ring spun cotton for a simply comfy shirt.

Cut to fit. Cut to wear. Anywhere.

Form fitting with a tapered body. Go ahead, wear it standalone or as part of your casual weekend outfit.

Tag, you're it.

Green oodotdot satin shirt label stitched at the neck hem.

A men's/unisex cut is also available.

Turtleturtle

If there was a turtle that was more awesome than a turtle, it would be Turtleturtle. Some say Turtleturtle’s name is a little redundant — but when you’re twice as awesome, your name naturally reflects that.

He knows a lot of really cool tricks, like walking slow, colouring outside the lines and facing left — it’s just talents he was naturally born with.

Despite his awesomeness though, he’s modest to a fault, and prefers to blend into the turtle crowd instead of standing in front of it.

name: Turtleninja Tee - Women
description:
The Tee

The Turtleninja tee in grey matter grey - designed and inspired by imagination.

Turtleninja is 1 of 4 turtles in a very limited-run series of Turtlegang tees as part of the oodotdot project.


The Details

Screen printed.

Hand screened in high quality Plastisol for a print made to last.

Feels good.

Made from 4.5 oz 100% ring spun cotton for a simply comfy shirt.

Cut to fit. Cut to wear. Anywhere.

Form fitting with a tapered body. Go ahead, wear it standalone or as part of your casual weekend outfit.

Tag, you're it.

Green oodotdot satin shirt label stitched at the neck hem.

A men's/unisex cut is also available.

Turtleninja

Little is known about Turtleninja except that he came from the far side of the pond in search of a new life. Legend has it, Turtleninja once freed all the animals at the petting zoo, cloaked in the shadow of the night.

He’s a master of disguises, able to take the likeness of a rock, a bowler hat or a mutant teenager.

During the day, he spends his time in the tall grass honing his arts… folding origami shurikens, paper cranes and cootie catchers.

name: Turtlegang Sticker Pack
description:
The Story

The Turtlegang were swimming at the pond one afternoon and began to wonder, where do stickers come from?

Turtleturtle thought that big stickers have little sticker babies.

Turtlezombie believed that they grew on sticker trees and fell to the ground in the autumn.

Turtleshark didn't know, but wondered if stickers were made of the same stuff as the tape that keeps his shark fin on.

Turtleninja knew the real answer. He said nothing, as was usual for him. Instead, he spent the rest of the day with his crayons colouring in secret.

The next day, the Turtlegang woke up to find a package. Lots and lots of stickers… of each of them! The turtles were shocked and surprised but ever so delighted mdash; but where did they come from?

The Stickers

Stickers! Who doesn't love stickers?

  • ✓ 12 Turtlegang stickers, each 1.5" (3.8cm) diameter
  • ✓ Each sticker is circular kiss cut
  • ✓ 4 stickers on each 3.5"x3.5" (8.89x8.89cm) sheet
  • ✓ Printed on thick, premium vinyl with a glossy laminate finish
  • ✓ Sheets are perforated so you can share them with a friend!
  • ✓ Stick 'em somewhere cool, take a photo and send it in!
